text:
Timo Honkela (August 4, 1962 – May 9, 2020) was a Finnish computer scientist. He was born in Helsinki. He worked at the University of Helsinki, Aalto University School of Science and Aalto University School of Art, Design and Architecture.
From 1998 to 2000, Honkela worked as a professor in the Aalto Media Lab.
Honkela died on May 9, 2020 in Helsinki, aged 57.

annotations.surface_form: School of Art, Design and Architecture
